item.title: Chris KEMPCZINSKI
item.description: For the sake of transparency, I will publish some of my communications to Mr. Kempczinski on the website Kempczinski.com.

item.title: Email to Steve Easterbrook and the Board of Directors of McDonald’s Corporation
item.description: From : [Key witness/whistleblower’s name, redacted for privacy] (info@europe-v-mcdonalds.org) Subject : Phone call about McDonald’s Monopoly frauds Date sent : May 31, 2019 at 23:36（Beijing time） To : Steve EASTERBROOK, Board of Directors of McDonald’s Corporation (bod@us.mcd.com) THIS EMAIL IS ALSO ADDRESSED TO THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS OF MCDONALD’S CORPORATION. I AM FORMALLY ASKING THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS OF MCDONALD’S CORPORATION TO IMMEDIATELY START AN OFFICIAL INQUIRY INTO THE MCDONALD’S MONOPOLY FRAUDS WHICH HAVE HAPPENED ACROSS EUROPE AND ACROSS THE WORLD FOR THE LAST FEW YEARS.

item.title: Additional frauds; email sent to McDonald’s General Counsel CCed to McDonald’s CEO
item.description: From: [Key witness/whistleblower’s name, redacted for privacy] Subject: additional frauds Date sent: 2015-10-22 11:06 (Beijing time +0800) To: Gloria.Santona@us.mcd.com Cc: Steve.Easterbrook@us.mcd.com Ms Santona, Thank you for answering me. Could you please make sure the French team communicate with me by email? Normal mail takes forever for me to receive now that I live in China and I am not going to wait one month to act if there is an ongoing fraud. Please don’t be offended, but I think it is unwise to only ask the French team, the very people who I accuse of committing a criminal fraud, to review the situation.

item.title: Reply from Gloria Santona, General Counsel of McDonald’s Corporation
item.description: KEY POINT OF THIS EVENT: By acknowledging that McDonald’s Corporation executives “take such inquiries seriously”, McDonald’s Corporation can’t claim plausible deniability anymore. Furthermore, the email from Ms. Santona who is the General Counsel of McDonald’s Corporation is CCed to the CEO of McDonald’s Corporation Steve Easterbrook. From: Gloria Santona Subject: Re: update Date received：2015-10-21 23:47 (Beijing time +0800) To: [Key witness/whistleblower’s name, redacted for privacy] Cc: Steve Easterbrook Thanks for your follow-up note. Of course, we take such inquiries seriously.

item.title: Email sent to Gloria Santona, General Counsel of McDonald’s Corporation, requesting an update
item.description: From: [Key witness/whistleblower’s name, redacted for privacy] Subject: update Date sent：2015-10-21 22:45 (Beijing time +0800) To: Gloria.Santona@us.mcd.com Cc: Steve.Easterbrook@us.mcd.com Ms. Santona, I would like to give a friendly reminder that I gave McDonald’s a deadline of October 22nd 2015 midnight GMT time. So you have about 36 hours left. It was 4 entire days which is more than enough considering I’ve sent my first cease and desist letter back in 2012. On top of this, had I known that the French branch had started scamming people again, I would have at the time only given you 24 to 48 hours.

item.title: Warning sent to McDonald’s executives about being an accessory after the fact
item.description: From: [Key witness/whistleblower’s name, redacted for privacy] Subject: Accessory after the facts Date sent:: October 21, 2015 at 12:33 (Beijing time +0800) To:: Gloria.Santona@us.mcd.com Cc:: Steve.Easterbrook@us.mcd.com, Robert.Gibbs@us.mcd.com, Silvia.Lagnado@us.mcd.com, Kevin.Ozan@us.mcd.com, Jim.Sappington@us.mcd.com, Mike.Andres@us.mcd.com, Nawfal.TRABELSI@fr.mcd.com, Isabelle.KUSTER@fr.mcd.com, Alexis.BOURDON@fr.mcd.com, Hubert.MONGON@fr.mcd.com, Christophe.CHAPUIS@fr.mcd.com, Xavier.ROYAUX@fr.mcd.com, Francoise.deBorda@fr.mcd.com Dear Ms. Santona, I am surprised that the French website carrying the fraud hasn’t been taken down yet.
